author: felicity
msg: bug 3865: specifying certain configuration parameters without a value didn't result in an error at parse time, but set an invalid value internally which could cause errors/etc.  do a simple check for numeric, boolean, and string values.

author: felicity
msg: bug 3872: when syncing the journal and getting seen updates, the code would call seen_{put,delete} which defer to the journal when learn_to_journal is set, resulting in the msgid never getting stored and being passed from one journal to the next in certain situations.

author: felicity
msg: bug 3831: due to the RegistrarBoundaries REs being too loose, we would often misparse the given domain into the wrong number of parts.  make the RE more strict to avoid this issue and also skip doing the RE check when the RE can't possibly match based on number of parts in the string.

author: jeremy
msg: adding close control to help popup for browsers that do not support current setup

author: jeremy
